claims.claim: Independence and self-learning are crucial for successful reentry.
claims.quote: You wanna be able to be independent. 'cause after so long being in, in that cage and, and everything is given to you all.

claims.claim: Lack of opportunities for self-advancement leads to recidivism.
claims.quote: A lot of people don't get that and a lot of, and then that just takes them back to what they know.

claims.claim: Reentry programs should include teaching practical skills like preparing a resume.
claims.quote: 'cause then you can, you can learn how to, you can put your resume on there.

claims.claim: The ability to learn and apply new skills is key to personal development post-release.
claims.quote: let me learn something on my own and then let me go see if I'm capable of doing A, B, and C and then getting the desired result that I would like to have

claims.claim: Frustration and lack of support post-release can lead to aggressive behavior.
claims.quote: it's just a matter of time for they turn to that ticking time bomb and they go off.

claims.claim: Timely intervention and support can prevent recidivism and aid in successful reentry.
